basics.name: MANGO
basics.label: FULL STACK DEVELOPER & UX/UI DESIGNER
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with a background in graphic design and digital interfaces. Specialized turning Figma designs into fully functional products.

about.title: HI, I'M MANGO
about.label: Full Stack Developer | UI/UX Designer
about.content: I am a Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in UX and design. In recent projects, I have taken on responsibilities in technical architecture and team coordination, which has strengthened my interest in bridging technology, user experience, and product strategy. My career spans creative agencies â€” where I collaborated with clients such as Coca-Cola and Vodafone â€” and fast-moving startups, giving me a broad perspective on turning ideas into digital products. I am now looking to grow in international environments where I can contribute this hybrid profile: a blend of technical expertise, design sensibility, and emerging leadership skills, while further developing my knowledge in DevOps and product strategy.
